snippet: Blaming Hurricane Sandy for those tight jeans, devising passwords that drive hackers away, the pay-as-you-go remodel and other consumer-focused news from The New York Times.

headline.main: Thursday Reading: Jeans Tight? Blame the 'Sandy Five' Weight Gain
